story_parts.text: A cat named Socks lived in a house with a family. One day, Socks saw a bird outside and wanted to catch it. She chased the bird around the yard until she finally caught it. The bird was injured and couldn't fly away. Socks killed the bird and brought it into the house. The family was not happy to see the dead bird and Socks was not allowed to keep it.

next_options.0: Socks is scolded by the family and told never to bring a dead bird into the house again
next_options.1: Socks is praised by the family for her hunting skills and is given a special treat

story_parts.text: Socks is scolded by the family and told never to bring a dead bird into the house again. Socks is very sorry and promises to never do it again.

next_options.0: Socks decides to bury the bird in the backyard
next_options.1: Socks secretly buries the bird in the backyard

quiz_parts.question: What does Socks promise never to do again?

options.0: Never play with dead birds again
options.1: Never bring a dead bird into the house again
